content.text:
# Yemeni President Cup

| current champions = Al-Wehda (2017)
| most successful team = Al-Ahli (San'a') (3 titles)
| website    = [http://www.yemenfa.com/ Official website]
}}
The Yemen President Cup
is the top knockout tournament of Yemeni football.
